Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: You brought me such a wonderful meal.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line1: It's as if you can read my mind.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line1: Would you like to become my own personal waiter?
Speaker.line2: I've been trying to find someone like you for a long time.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I'm afraid I have to stay until the tea is ready, ma'am.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Surprise
Speaker.line2: I wasn't aware of that policy.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: In that case, I have a thing or two to discuss with you.
